remarks: The orthocomplement for the final constructed Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hlhil0.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hlhil0.l $e |- L = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhil0.u $e |- U = ( ( HLHil ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhil0.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hlhilocv.v $e |- V = ( Base ` L ) $.
hlhilocv.n $e |- N = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hlhilocv.o $e |- O = ( ocv ` U ) $.
hlhilocv.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
hlhilocv $p |- ( ph -> ( O ` X ) = ( N ` X ) ) $.
